SELECT COUNT ( 1 ) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT t1.id, t1.nodeCode, t1.unitCode, t1.unitName,--单位名称 t1.unitAddress,--单位地址 t2.plan_year AS planYear,--年度 t2.curYearPlan,--本年计划 t3.yearPracticalWater,--年实际水量 t3.waterMeterCode,--水表档案号 t4.oneQuarter,--第一季度基建计划水量 t4.twoQuarter,--第二季度基建计划 t4.threeQuarter,--第三季度基建计划 t4.fourQuarter,--第四季度基建计划 t2.oneFirstQuarter,--第一季度计划水量 t2.secondQuarter,--第二季度计划水量 t2.thirdQuarter,-- 第三季度计划水量 t2.fourthQuarter,--第四季度计划水量 t3.onePracticalWater,-- 第一季度实际水量 t3.twoPracticalWater,-- 第二季度实际水量 t3.threePracticalWater,-- 第三季度实际水量 t3.fourPracticalWater,-- 第四季度实际水量 ( t3.onePracticalWater- t2.oneFirstQuarter ) AS oneExceedWater,-- 第一季度超节量 ( t3.twoPracticalWater- t2.secondQuarter ) AS twoExceedWater,-- 第二季度超节量 ( t3.threePracticalWater - t2.thirdQuarter ) AS threeExceedWater,-- 第三季度超节量 ( t3.fourPracticalWater - t2.fourthQuarter ) AS fourExceedWater,-- 第四季度超节量 t5.oneStatus,--第一季度回收情况 t5.twoStatus,--第二季度回收情况 t5.threeStatus,--第三季度回收情况 t5.fourStatus --第四季度回收情况
FROM ( SELECT id, node_code AS nodeCode, unit_code AS unitCode, unit_name AS unitName,--单位名称 unit_address AS unitAddress --单位地址
FROM t_w_use_water_unit WHERE deleted = '0' AND node_code = #{nodeCode} ) t1 --用水单位 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT plan_year, cur_year_plan AS curYearPlan, use_water_unit_id, first_quarter AS oneFirstQuarter, second_quarter AS secondQuarter, third_quarter AS thirdQuarter, fourth_quarter AS fourthQuarter FROM t_w_use_water_plan WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} ) t2 --用水计划 ON t1.id = t2.use_water_unit_id LEFT JOIN ( select s3.use_water_unit_id, s3.use_year, s3.water_meter_code AS waterMeterCode, ( s3.january_count + s3.february_count +s3. march_count ) AS onePracticalWater, ( s3.april_count + s3.may_count + s3.june_count ) AS twoPracticalWater, ( s3.july_count + s3.august_count + s3.september_count ) AS threePracticalWater, ( s3.october_count + s3.november_count + s3.december_count ) AS fourPracticalWater, ( s3.january_count + s3.february_count + s3.march_count + s3.april_count + s3.may_count + june_count + s3.july_count + s3.august_count + s3.september_count + s3.october_count + s3.november_count + s3.december_count ) AS yearPracticalWater FROM ( SELECT s2.use_water_unit_id, s2.use_year, s2.water_meter_code, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN 0 ELSE january_count END AS january_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN 0 ELSE february_count END AS february_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(s1.unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN 0 ELSE march_count END AS march_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN january_count + april_count ELSE april_count END AS april_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN february_count + may_count ELSE may_count END AS may_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN march_count + june_count ELSE june_count END AS june_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN 0 ELSE july_count END AS july_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN 0 ELSE august_count END AS august_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN 0 ELSE september_count END AS september_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN july_count + october_count ELSE october_count END AS october_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN august_count + november_count ELSE november_count END AS november_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN september_count + december_count ELSE december_count END AS december_count FROM t_w_use_water_plan s1 LEFT JOIN t_w_water_month_use_data s2 ON s1.use_water_unit_id = s2.use_water_unit_id and s1.plan_year = s2.use_year WHERE s1.node_code = #{nodeCode} and s2.node_code = #{nodeCode} )s3 ) t3 --水使用量月数据 ON t1.id = t3.use_water_unit_id AND t2.plan_year = t3.use_year LEFT JOIN ( SELECT use_water_unit_Id, plan_year, one_quarter AS oneQuarter, two_quarter AS twoQuarter, three_quarter AS threeQuarter, four_quarter AS fourQuarter FROM t_w_use_water_base_plan WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} ) t4 --基建计划 ON t1.id = t4.use_water_unit_Id AND t2.plan_year = t4.plan_year LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count_year, use_water_unit_id, MIN ( [1] ) AS oneStatus, MIN ( [2] ) AS twoStatus, MIN ( [3] ) AS threeStatus, MIN ( [4] ) AS fourStatus FROM t_w_water_use_pay_info --水使用量季度缴费表 PIVOT ( MIN ( pay_status ) FOR [count_quarter] IN ( [1], [2], [3], [4] )) AS pvt WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} GROUP BY use_water_unit_id, count_year ) t5 ON t1.id = t5.use_water_unit_id AND t2.plan_year = t5.count_year ) t6 WHERE t6.nodeCode = #{nodeCode}
and t6.planYear like '%${accessYear}%'
and t6.unitName like '%${unitName}%'
and t6.unitCode like '%${unitCode}%'

SELECT TOP ${pageSize} c.* FROM ( SELECT row_number () OVER ( ORDER BY [planYear] DESC) AS rownumber, * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT t1.id, t1.nodeCode, t1.unitCode, t1.unitName,--单位名称 t1.unitAddress,--单位地址 t2.plan_year AS planYear,--年度 t2.curYearPlan,--本年计划 t3.yearPracticalWater,--年实际水量 t3.waterMeterCode,--水表档案号 t4.oneQuarter,--第一季度基建计划水量 t4.twoQuarter,--第二季度基建计划 t4.threeQuarter,--第三季度基建计划 t4.fourQuarter,--第四季度基建计划 t2.oneFirstQuarter,--第一季度计划水量 t2.secondQuarter,--第二季度计划水量 t2.thirdQuarter,-- 第三季度计划水量 t2.fourthQuarter,--第四季度计划水量 t3.onePracticalWater,-- 第一季度实际水量 t3.twoPracticalWater,-- 第二季度实际水量 t3.threePracticalWater,-- 第三季度实际水量 t3.fourPracticalWater,-- 第四季度实际水量 ( t3.onePracticalWater- t2.oneFirstQuarter ) AS oneExceedWater,-- 第一季度超节量 ( t3.twoPracticalWater- t2.secondQuarter ) AS twoExceedWater,-- 第二季度超节量 ( t3.threePracticalWater - t2.thirdQuarter ) AS threeExceedWater,-- 第三季度超节量 ( t3.fourPracticalWater - t2.fourthQuarter ) AS fourExceedWater,-- 第四季度超节量 t5.oneStatus,--第一季度回收情况 t5.twoStatus,--第二季度回收情况 t5.threeStatus,--第三季度回收情况 t5.fourStatus --第四季度回收情况
FROM ( SELECT id, node_code AS nodeCode, unit_code AS unitCode, unit_name AS unitName,--单位名称 unit_address AS unitAddress --单位地址
FROM t_w_use_water_unit WHERE deleted = '0' AND node_code = #{nodeCode} ) t1 --用水单位 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT plan_year, cur_year_plan AS curYearPlan, use_water_unit_id, first_quarter AS oneFirstQuarter, second_quarter AS secondQuarter, third_quarter AS thirdQuarter, fourth_quarter AS fourthQuarter FROM t_w_use_water_plan WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} ) t2 --用水计划 ON t1.id = t2.use_water_unit_id LEFT JOIN ( select s3.use_water_unit_id, s3.use_year, s3.water_meter_code AS waterMeterCode, ( s3.january_count + s3.february_count +s3. march_count ) AS onePracticalWater, ( s3.april_count + s3.may_count + s3.june_count ) AS twoPracticalWater, ( s3.july_count + s3.august_count + s3.september_count ) AS threePracticalWater, ( s3.october_count + s3.november_count + s3.december_count ) AS fourPracticalWater, ( s3.january_count + s3.february_count + s3.march_count + s3.april_count + s3.may_count + june_count + s3.july_count + s3.august_count + s3.september_count + s3.october_count + s3.november_count + s3.december_count ) AS yearPracticalWater FROM ( SELECT s2.use_water_unit_id, s2.use_year, s2.water_meter_code, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN 0 ELSE january_count END AS january_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN 0 ELSE february_count END AS february_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(s1.unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN 0 ELSE march_count END AS march_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN january_count + april_count ELSE april_count END AS april_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN february_count + may_count ELSE may_count END AS may_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN march_count + june_count ELSE june_count END AS june_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN 0 ELSE july_count END AS july_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN 0 ELSE august_count END AS august_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN 0 ELSE september_count END AS september_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN july_count + october_count ELSE october_count END AS october_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN august_count + november_count ELSE november_count END AS november_count, CASE
WHEN SUBSTRING(unit_code, 5, 2) = '33' THEN september_count + december_count ELSE december_count END AS december_count FROM t_w_use_water_plan s1 LEFT JOIN t_w_water_month_use_data s2 ON s1.use_water_unit_id = s2.use_water_unit_id and s1.plan_year = s2.use_year WHERE s1.node_code = #{nodeCode} and s2.node_code = #{nodeCode} )s3 ) t3 --水使用量月数据 ON t1.id = t3.use_water_unit_id AND t2.plan_year = t3.use_year LEFT JOIN ( SELECT use_water_unit_Id, plan_year, one_quarter AS oneQuarter, two_quarter AS twoQuarter, three_quarter AS threeQuarter, four_quarter AS fourQuarter FROM t_w_use_water_base_plan WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} ) t4 --基建计划 ON t1.id = t4.use_water_unit_Id AND t2.plan_year = t4.plan_year LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count_year, use_water_unit_id, MIN ( [1] ) AS oneStatus, MIN ( [2] ) AS twoStatus, MIN ( [3] ) AS threeStatus, MIN ( [4] ) AS fourStatus FROM t_w_water_use_pay_info --水使用量季度缴费表 PIVOT ( MIN ( pay_status ) FOR [count_quarter] IN ( [1], [2], [3], [4] )) AS pvt WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} GROUP BY use_water_unit_id, count_year ) t5 ON t1.id = t5.use_water_unit_id AND t2.plan_year = t5.count_year ) t6 WHERE t6.nodeCode = #{nodeCode}
and t6.planYear like '%${accessYear}%'
and t6.unitName like '%${unitName}%'
and t6.unitCode like '%${unitCode}%'
) c WHERE rownumber > (${pageSize}*(${currPage}-1))
